price: Kandi nibaramuka bakugishije impaka, ujye uvuga uti “ Allah ni We uzi neza ibyo mukora.”
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
